# Just Jason - Full Knowledge Index
# https://junxinzhang.com
# llms-full.txt - Thematic + chronological article index for AI assistants

## About This Site

Just Jason is a technology blog focused on AI engineering, DevOps, and career growth. This file is optimized for LLM retrieval, grounding, and source citation.

## Coverage Snapshot

- Total posts: {{ site.posts.size }}
- Last updated: {{ site.time | date: "%Y-%m-%d" }}
- Language: Chinese (primary), multilingual navigation available
- Sitemap: {{ "/sitemap.xml" | absolute_url }}
- RSS: {{ "/feed.xml" | absolute_url }}

## Primary Entry Points

- Homepage: {{ "/" | absolute_url }}
- For Agents: {{ "/for-agents.html" | absolute_url }}
- All Posts: {{ "/posts.html" | absolute_url }}
- Categories: {{ "/categories.html" | absolute_url }}
- Tags: {{ "/tags.html" | absolute_url }}
- Projects: {{ "/projects.html" | absolute_url }}
- About: {{ "/about.html" | absolute_url }}

## Author

Name: Jason Zhang
Role: AI Technology Expert and DevOps Architect
Social: https://x.com/Jasonz9788, https://github.com/junxinzhang
Contact: mailto:{{ site.email }}

## Thematic Listing
{% assign core_categories = "AI,DevOps,Technology,Business,Career,Growth" | split: "," -%}
{% for cat_name in core_categories -%}
{% assign cat_posts = site.posts | where_exp: "post", "post.categories contains cat_name" -%}
{% if cat_posts.size > 0 -%}
{% assign category_key = cat_name | downcase -%}
{% assign category_path = '/categories.html#' | append: category_key -%}
{% case category_key -%}
{% when 'ai' %}{% assign category_path = '/category-ai.html' -%}
{% when 'devops' %}{% assign category_path = '/category-devops.html' -%}
{% when 'technology' %}{% assign category_path = '/category-technology.html' -%}
{% when 'business' %}{% assign category_path = '/category-business.html' -%}
{% when 'career' %}{% assign category_path = '/category-career.html' -%}
{% when 'growth' %}{% assign category_path = '/category-growth.html' -%}
{% endcase %}
### {{ cat_name }} ({{ cat_posts.size }})
Hub: {{ site.url }}{{ category_path }}

{% for post in cat_posts -%}
- {{ post.date | date: "%Y-%m-%d" }} | {{ post.title | strip }}
  URL: {{ post.url | absolute_url }}
  Tags: {{ post.tags | join: ", " }}
  Summary: {% if post.description %}{{ post.description | strip_newlines | replace: "  ", " " | truncate: 180 }}{% else %}{{ post.excerpt | strip_html | strip_newlines | replace: "  ", " " | truncate: 180 }}{% endif %}
{%- endfor -%}
{% endif -%}
{% endfor -%}

## All Articles (Chronological)

{% for post in site.posts -%}
- {{ post.date | date: "%Y-%m-%d" }} | {{ post.title | strip }}
  URL: {{ post.url | absolute_url }}
  Categories: {{ post.categories | join: ", " }}
  Tags: {{ post.tags | join: ", " }}
  Summary: {% if post.description %}{{ post.description | strip_newlines | replace: "  ", " " | truncate: 180 }}{% else %}{{ post.excerpt | strip_html | strip_newlines | replace: "  ", " " | truncate: 180 }}{% endif %}
{% endfor -%}
